name: Deadly Penguins - VR
description:
Welcome to 'Deadly Penguins - VR', a shooter experience set in an Arctic base. As the player, you are tasked with defending your trusted companion, a dog, from a relentless horde of zombie penguins.

Faced with dangerous enemies, you'll have access to an arsenal of weapons to choose from, including rifles, shotguns, pistols and explosives.  As the difficulty increases, you'll need to use all of your skills and strategy to overcome the zombie penguins and emerge victorious. Will you be able to survive those deadly creatures and save your dog?"

Featuring a Online Leaderboard
Controls / Instructions:
  • Trigger Button - Shoot / Activate / Use Items
  • Grip Button - Grab Items
  • Primary Button - Drop Magazine
  • Touch your chest pouches with your gun to reload.
  • To buy items and guns hover over the desired item with bare hands then hold the grip button and press the trigger.
  • To submit score with PCVR use your physical pc keyboard to write your name, on quest 2 the native quest keyboard will be opened.
